text: Kenneth Brian "Babyface" Edmonds (born April 10, 1959) is an American R&B; musician. He released his first album Lovers in 1986. He has won ten Grammy Awards. He started a record label called Soda Pop Records in 2009. Babyface will release an album with Toni Braxton called Love Marriage & Divorce in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1959 births Category:African-American musicians Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Living people
title: Babyface
